src:
Matan de 30 balazos a 2 niñas mientras pedían Halloween en Ecatepec
Hombres armados a bordo de un vehículo detuvieron su marcha para matar a balazos a dos niñas y a su madre, quienes perdieron la vida en Ecatepec; un niño se encuentra herido
01 Nov 2019, 08:17 by El Debate
Ecatepec.- Un grupo de hombres armados asesinaron a dos niñas y a su mamá por las calles de Ecatepec este jueves a las 22:00 horas cuando los menores, en compañía de su madre se encontraban pidiendo Halloween. Además dejaron a un niño herido.
De acuerdo con información del Heraldo de México, la agresión se registró afuera de una tienda departamental ubicada en la calle Emiliano Zapata, en la colonia Luis Donaldo Colosio.




En ese momento los menores se encontraban pidiendo “calaverita” cuando pasó un automóvil en movimiento, en la que hombres armados estaban armados y comenzaron a disparar al menos 30 veces sobre los menores, de los cuales se dice tienen entre 6, 8 y 10 años y su madre, quienes dos de ellos eran niños y perdieron la vida, dejando a un niño herido.



Posteriormente los hombres huyeron con rumbo desconocido tras cometer la agresión y hasta el momento se desconoce su paradero.






Ecatepec


Asesinato


Familia


Halloween
text:
They kill 30 girls with 2 shots while they asked for Halloween in Ecatepec
Armed men aboard a vehicle stopped their march to shoot two girls and their mother, who lost their lives in Ecatepec; a child is injured
01 Nov 2019, 08:17 by El Debate
Ecatepec.- A group of armed men murdered two girls and their mother in the streets of Ecatepec this Thursday at 10 pm when the children, in the company of their mother were asking for Halloween. They also left an injured child.
According to information from the Herald of Mexico, the aggression was recorded outside a department store located on Emiliano Zapata Street, in the Luis Donaldo Colosio neighborhood.




At that time the minors were asking for “calaverita” when a moving car passed, in which armed men were armed and began firing at least 30 times on the minors, of which it is said they are between 6, 8 and 10 years old and his mother, who two of them were children and lost their lives, leaving a wounded child.



Subsequently, the men fled in an unknown direction after committing the aggression and their whereabouts are unknown.






Ecatepec


Murder


Family


Halloween
